Powers.String: local Devices, Device, Object = ... if Object.Powers[2].Active then print('Game Over') end

Powers.Name: Bullet
Powers.String: local Created, Creator, General = ... local Center, Point, v = Creator.Translation, {Creator.Transformated.data[0], Creator.Transformated.data[1], Creator.Transformated.data[2]}, Created.Objects[1] v.Speed = General.Library.VectorSubtraction(Point, Center) for i=1,3 do v.Speed[i] = v.Speed[i] / 30 v.Rotation[i] = Creator.Rotation[i] v.Translation[i] = Center[i] end v.Rotation[4] = Creator.Rotation[4]

Powers.Name: Asteroid
Powers.String: local Created, Creator, General = ... local Center, v = Creator.Translation, Created.Objects[1] for i=1,3 do if math.random(1, 2) == 1 then v.Translation[i] = Center[i] + math.random(30, 50) else v.Translation[i] = Creator.Translation[i] - math.random(30, 50) end end local c1, c2 = Creator.Translation, v.Translation local Move = General.Library.VectorSubtraction(c1, c2) for i=1,3 do v.Speed[i] = Move[i]/10000 v.RotationSpeed[i + 1] = math.random()/300 end

local Devices, Device, Object, Power, Time = ... if Power.SumTime then Power.SumTime = Power.SumTime + Time if Power.SumTime > 2000 then Power.Niceness = Power.Niceness - 1 print('Niceness:', Power.Niceness) Power.SumTime = Power.SumTime - 2000 end else Power.SumTime = Time Power.Niceness = 1000 end

local Devices, Device, Object, Power, Time = ... if Power.SumTime then Power.SumTime = Power.SumTime + Time if Power.SumTime > Object.Powers[11].Niceness then Object.Powers[10].Active = true Power.SumTime = Power.SumTime - Object.Powers[11].Niceness end else Power.SumTime = Time end

local Devices, Device, Object, Power = ... if Power.LastScore then if Power.LastScore < Power.Score then Power.LastScore = Power.Score print('Score:', Power.LastScore) end else Power.LastScore = 0 Power.Score = 0 end
local Devices, Device, Object, Power = ... if Power.Device and Power.Device.Name == 'Asteroid' then Object.Powers[2].Active = true Power.Active = false end
